delay_helper: Delays this action by the given number of seconds
events_cancel_helper: These events cancel the processing of delayed actions
events_helper: These events trigger the processing of actions
m_descr:
Run multiple actions whenever a specific event is triggered. Events may be triggered from other automation modules such as the Rain, SecurityZone, Astronomy or Presence modules. It is possible to define multiple actions, such as switching lights, dimmers and running scenes. An event watcher can consist of multiple steps that run with configurable delays. Optionally, the processing of multi-step watchers can be canceled by other events.
Check github.com/maros/Zway-EventWatcher for detailed documentation.
